title: Azure Cloud Engineer
description:
**Azure Cloud Engineer på Advania️**
------------------------------------


Som Azure Cloud Engineer, inom affärsområde Managed Services Provider arbetar du nära kunden och hjälper verksamheten etablera, effektivisera och vidareutveckla sin miljö i Microsoft Azure. Du blir en viktig del av ett engagerat inhouse-team som tillsammans ansvarar för såväl drift som utveckling, alltid med kundens behov i centrum.  

  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter;**

* Bygga och förvalta lösningar i Microsoft Azure
* Automatisera och effektivisera infrastruktur med verktyg som PowerShell, Bicep och Azure DevOps
* Delta i kundleveranser och driva molntransformationer i nära samarbete med kund
* Bidra till arkitektur, teknikutveckling och interna förbättringar – utifrån din erfarenhet och dina intressen


Du jobbar nära både tekniken och kunden, med stöd av ett kompetent team där vi löser utmaningar tillsammans. Rollen är flexibel, utmanande och full av möjligheter.

**Vad vi söker hos dig**
------------------------

Vi tror att du är en teknikintresserad och lösningsorienterad person som trivs med att kombinera praktiskt arbete i Azure med kunddialog och förbättringsarbete. Du har en god helhetsförståelse för IT-infrastruktur och gillar att arbeta med automatisering, struktur och modern molnteknik.


Vi söker dig som har:

* Praktisk erfarenhet av Azure och har arbetat med molnautomation
* Goda kunskaper i PowerShell samt gärna även Bicep och Azure DevOps
* Vana att arbeta med Infrastructure as Code och CI/CD-pipelines
* Tidigare erfarenhet inom IT-drift eller infrastruktur
* En kommunikativ förmåga som bygger broar mellan teknik och människa, både i kunddialoger och internt samarbete.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift
  


Här hos oss på Advania får du vara med och skapa hållbara värden genom smart användning av teknik. Du gör det tillsammans med kunniga kollegor, trygga kunder och en inkluderande kultur. Vi jobbar långsiktigt, både i våra leveranser och i våra relationer, och tror på kraften i att ge varje individ möjlighet att växa och påverka.

### **Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**

Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och perspektiv – mångfald stärker både våra team och våra lösningar.


I den här rekryteringen samarbetar vi med Professional Nord. Du uppmanas att skicka in din ansökan redan idag – första urvalet sker direkt efter semestertider.


Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll. Advania samarbetar även med Ljung & Sjöberg för att skapa en trygg arbetsmiljö fri från riskbruk av alkohol och droger.


Har du frågor om tjänsten eller processen? Kontakta gärna Lucas Bryggman eller skriv till **info@pn.se**.
company_description: Advania är ett techbolag som utformar skräddarsydda lösningar och skapar hållbara värden genom smart användning av teknik.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.


We are looking for a motivated Junior or Mid-Level .NET Developer to join our BDIP (Business Data Integration Platform) team — a cloud-native, integration-focused platform designed to expose a wide range of APIs consumed by both internal and external systems.

**About the Project**
---------------------


BDIP is a modern Azure-based platform built entirely in the cloud. It provides secure and scalable APIs for accessing business-critical data. The platform is actively maintained and modernized; you won’t be working with outdated legacy systems. Our focus is on clean architecture, maintainability, and code quality.

**Team & Methodology**
----------------------


You’ll be part of a friendly, cross-functional **Scrum team** of around 10 people. You will work closely with a tech lead, senior developers and other team members to:

* Understand business requirements
* Develop new features and APIs
* Review code and receive feedback
* Learn how to monitor and support applications in the cloud

  

We follow DevOps principles, which means we build, test, deploy, and support what we create. You will receive guidance and mentoring along the way.


We use Azure DevOps for planning, code reviews, and deployments. The BDIP platform is hosted fully in Microsoft Azure and there are no on-premise resources.

**Tech Stack You’ll Work With**
-------------------------------

* C# (.NET 8 and above)
* Microsoft Azure (App Services, Functions, Key Vault, Storage, etc.)
* REST APIs
* Terraform (Infrastructure as Code)
* Azure DevOps (Boards, Repos, Pipelines)
* APIC (API Management)
* Other tools used in modern cloud-native applications
**Who We Are Looking For**
--------------------------


We’re looking for a developer who values code quality, is eager to learn, and enjoys working in a modern cloud and DevOps environment. You should feel comfortable asking questions, receiving feedback, and gradually taking on more responsibility with the support of your team.

 **What you’ll be doing**

* Implementing and extending .NET-based APIs and services
* Writing clean, maintainable, and testable code
* Collaborating with senior team members during development and code reviews
* Learning to work with cloud services and infrastructure
* Participating in team meetings, planning sessions, and daily stand-ups
* Taking part in deployments and application support with guidance from the team
**Long Description**
--------------------

**What we’re looking For**

* Good understanding of C#/.NET
* Some professional experience in .NET development (internships or open-source contributions are also welcome)
* Willingness to learn Azure and DevOps tools
* Basic understanding of REST APIs
* Interest in clean code, quality, and long-term maintainability
* Good communication skills and a team player mindset
* Proactive approach to learning and problem-solving

 **Nice to Have**

* Experience with Microsoft Azure services
* Familiarity with Terraform or any infrastructure as code tool
* Basic understanding of CI/CD concepts
**Ready for the next move?**
----------------------------


This is a great opportunity to join a modern cloud-first team and grow in a supportive environment where you’ll learn from experienced engineers and work with cutting-edge tools. In a team that cares for you as a person, have fun together and alow you to learn from your misstakes.

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

We are committed to shaping the future landscape of efficient, safe, and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents across the group’s leading brands and entities.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, you will be working with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to be able to leave our society in better shape for the next generation. We are passionate about what we do, and we thrive on teamwork. We are almost 100,000 people united around the world by a culture of care, inclusiveness, and empowerment.

 **Group Digital & IT** is the hub for digital development within Volvo Group. Imagine yourself working with cutting-edge technologies in a global team, represented in more than 30 countries. We are dedicated to leading the way of tomorrow’s transport solutions, guided by a strong customer mindset and high level of curiosity, both as individuals and as a team. Here, you will thrive in your career in an environment where your voice is heard and your ideas matter.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: On-site Junior IT-tekniker
description:
**On-site Junior IT-tekniker till Teleperformance i Göteborg**

**Är du en lösningsorienterad tekniker med ett genuint intresse för IT och service? Vill du vara en viktig del av ett engagerat IT-team på ett globalt företag? Då kan det här vara jobbet för dig!**

#### **Om rollen**


Som **On-site IT-tekniker** på Teleperformance i Göteborg kommer du att arbeta med teknisk support, användaradministration samt drift och underhåll av IT-miljön. Du kommer att vara förstalinjens kontakt för våra medarbetare och ansvara för att lösa både enklare och mer avancerade tekniska problem – både på plats och på distans.


Rollen innefattar även administrativa uppgifter och deltagande i utvecklingsprojekt kopplade till infrastruktur, nätverk och telefoni. Du arbetar nära kollegor inom TP Nordic och andra funktioner inom organisationen.

#### **Ansvarsområden**

* Första kontaktpunkt för IT-relaterade incidenter och ärenden via telefon och ärendehanteringssystem.
* Felsökning och support av både hårdvara (PC, laptops, skrivare etc.) och mjukvara.
* Användaradministration i Active Directory och andra system.
* Säkerställa att licenser hanteras korrekt och enligt företagets regler.
* Dokumentera förändringar, rutiner och processer inom TP IT.
* Bidra till att upprätthålla en modern och säker IT-arbetsmiljö.
* Delta i utvecklingsprojekt kopplade till infrastruktur, nätverk och telefoni.
* Medverka i säkerhetsarbeten enligt GISP, GDPR samt TP:s egna säkerhetspolicys.
* Följa upp loggar och övervaka system.
* Samverka med andra supportfunktioner vid behov.

#### **Kvalifikationer**

**Krav:**

* B körkort.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Erfarenhet av teknisk support och användarsupport.
* God vana av administration i Active Directory.


**Meriterande:**

* Erfarenhet av Entra ID.
* Erfarenhet av Linux-serverhantering.
* Kunskap inom dynamiska routingprotokoll, särskilt BGP.
* Erfarenhet av brandväggskonfiguration, gärna med Cisco eller Palo Alto.


#### **Vi söker dig som är:**


Teknisk kunnig och har ett brett IT-intresse.


Serviceinriktad med god kommunikationsförmåga.


Strukturerad, noggrann och lösningsfokuserad.


Van att arbeta självständigt och prioritera under tidspress.


#### **Om anställningen**


Placering: Göteborg (på plats, ej distansarbete)  

Anställningsform: Tillsvidare med 6 månaders provanställning


**Välkommen med din ansökan och bli en del av Teleperformance – ett globalt ledande företag inom kundservice och teknisk support!**

  

️ **Sista ansökningsdag:** Juli 2025  

️ Urval sker löpande – tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag.


**Frågor?** Kontakta Nordic IT Desktop Manager Victor Brolin på:  

**victor.brolin@teleperformance.com**


Skicka in din ansökan redan idag och bli en del av ett globalt ledande företag inom kundservice och teknik!


VIKTIG INFORMATION


När du sökt tjänsten så kommer du få tillgång till en digital intervju med chat-roboten Hubert som tar ca 10-15 minuter. **Vi ser gärna att du svarar på intervjun inom 48 timmar** för att snabbt komma vidare i processen. Kolla gärna denna artikel innan intervjun för tips och tricks: https://my.hubert.ai/advice-before-hubert-interview/sv-se


Syftet med Hubert-intervjun är att vi vill ge alla kandidater möjligheten att berätta mer om sig själva samt för oss att säkerställa att alla kandidater blir bedömda på samma sätt, oavsett kön, ålder och etnicitet.


Du kommer därefter bli kontaktad.

title: Digital & IT - Partnership Principal
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**What you will do**
--------------------


The Strategy and Digital Transformation management team drives the Volvo Group’s digital agenda by aligning business strategy, technology and organizational capabilities. We support the Volvo Group CDO in setting the strategic direction for Digital & IT, transforming how we work and enhancing our organization capabilities, to drive the Digital & IT community forward. We orchestrate the development of outcome-driven plans, aligned with strategic goals, and steer the execution of strategic programs. We build key relationships with external partners, that enable sustainable value creation across the Group.

  

With expertise in digital strategy, transformation management, and emerging technologies, together, we ensure that Volvo Group remains at the forefront of digital evolution - responsive, resilient, and future-ready. We like to be ahead of the curve, tackling complex challenges with curiosity, creativity, and a shared purpose.  

Our diverse team thrives on collaboration, bringing energy to every transformation initiative. We believe in making room for learning and laughter along the way, ensuring that our journey is as rewarding as our destination, with a focus on long-term impact for the Volvo Group.


Join us on our transformation journey to the digital future.

  

This Is How You Could Make An Impact

  

As Digital & IT Partnership Principal, you will be key in our digital transformation, driving the cultural and knowledge shift of the entire Volvo Group in becoming a digital first company.  

You will be a member of the Digital & IT Partnership team within the Strategy & Digital Transformation function and report to Vice President, Head of Partnership. You will have the opportunity to work with several of the areas within our function and especially related to strategy and external collaborations.

  

These will be some of your responsibilities

* Technology and competencies Make/Buy/Partner framework and orchestration.
* Orchestration of strategy and partnerships (for tech and competencies)
* Lead and deliver necessary workshops to drive the make/buy and partner agenda within D&IT and across functions and with executives.
* Execution of key partnerships in cooperation with stakeholders.
* Collaborate with Volvo entities in building & establishing ecosystems.
* Design, plan and implement ways of working with and through other functions and stakeholders.
* Provide strategic sourcing expertise and ensure that optimal sourcing can be conducted by purchasing.
* Coordination with purchasing (Group Trucks Purchasing).
* Strategic perspective of Digital & IT business associations & networks.
* You will be instrumental in identifying, establishing and managing a network of relevant partnerships and ecosystems in tight cooperation with other functions and organizations.
**Who are you?**
----------------


As Digital & IT Partnership Principal you will be key to Volvo Group’s digital transformation, collaborating globally. You will balance big picture thinking with hands-on tasks. You understand digital transformation, value collaboration, and thrive in complex, ambiguous environments.

  

We believe that:

* You possess business acumen and can see the bigger picture, connecting business needs with Digital & IT goals in meaningful ways. You're responsible for making sure the D&IT partnership approach comes to life.
* You’ve got a solid understanding of business and finance, and you’re great at managing external relationships and commercial models beyond just transactions.
* You’re comfortable presenting to senior stakeholders, building trust and encouraging collaboration.
* You’re skilled at creating positive collaboration beyond company boundaries and can represent Volvo’s interests in complex environments.
* You’re likely a senior professional with experience as a business developer, sales manager, or purchasing professional.
* You have industry awareness and an understanding of the Volvo Group, and experience in digital-first organizations is a big plus.
* You have a university degree or equivalent experience in driving strategic initiatives across functions.
* We believe that you thrive to become a key player in the Volvo Group digital transformation, while working with amazing people around the world.
* You have a university degree or equivalent and experience in driving strategic initiatives across functions, you get going on working with others and through others.
* You are a strategic thinker and truly interested in business, with hands-on approach, capable of switching between strategic thinking and operational creating.
* To be successful in this role you have an excellent understanding of the digital transformation, and the value digital creates for the enterprise. You believe in true collaborations where both parties can gain value and complement each other. In addition, you work with a global mindset, thrive in complex environments, and feel comfortable with ambiguity and challenging the status quo.
**What’s in it for you?**
-------------------------


Are we a good match?  

If you always strive for something bigger and can’t wait to be a part of the greatest shift in the history of transport and infrastructure, this is your unique opportunity. We offer you autonomy and freedom in defining your agenda and a great challenge to build something new. While developing your strategies and plans, you will be welcomed in an environment where we support and help each other grow.  

The location for the position is flexible, with a preference for Gothenburg.

  

For questions reach out to hiring manager Jessica Ek Jessica.ek@volvo.com  

Last application date the 30th of August.  

  

 We are looking forward to receiving your application!

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

We are committed to shaping the future landscape of efficient, safe, and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents across the group’s leading brands and entities.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, you will be working with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to be able to leave our society in better shape for the next generation. We are passionate about what we do, and we thrive on teamwork. We are almost 100,000 people united around the world by a culture of care, inclusiveness, and empowerment.

 **Group Digital & IT** is the hub for digital development within Volvo Group. Imagine yourself working with cutting-edge technologies in a global team, represented in more than 30 countries. We are dedicated to leading the way of tomorrow’s transport solutions, guided by a strong customer mindset and high level of curiosity, both as individuals and as a team. Here, you will thrive in your career in an environment where your voice is heard and your ideas matter.

title: Junior Applications Consultant- Supply chain
description:
Som junior applikationskonsult kommer du att arbeta i nära samarbete med erfarna kollegor och lösningsarkitekter i projekt som rör både implementation och vidareutveckling av D365 F&SCM. Du får praktisk erfarenhet av hur affärsprocesser digitaliseras och optimeras med hjälp av modern teknik från Microsoft.


Din roll:


Till en början kommer du att ha en assisterande roll med tydlig handledning, men i takt med att du utvecklas finns goda möjligheter att ta mer ansvar. Du kommer att få arbeta med olika delar av systemet och affärsprocesserna det stödjer, samtidigt som du utvecklar din förståelse för både teknik och verksamhet.


Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:


Delta i konfiguration och uppsättning av D365 Finance & Supply Chain Management tillsammans med seniora konsulter


Medverka i workshops, tester, systemvalidering och användarstöd


Skapa dokumentation, utbildningsmaterial och bistå vid användarutbildningar


Lära dig kunders affärsprocesser inom områden som ekonomi, inköp, lagerhantering och produktion


Om Dynamics 365 Finance & Supply Chain Management:


Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Supply Chain Management (D365 F&SCM) är ett omfattande affärssystem (ERP) som stödjer hela verksamhetskedjan hos större företag. Det möjliggör styrning och effektivisering av processer inom exempelvis redovisning, budgetering, inköp, lager, produktion och distribution. D365 är en viktig del i många företags digitaliseringsresor och används som nav för datadrivet beslutsfattande och automatiserade flöden.


Hos oss får du lära dig både den tekniska plattformen och affärslogiken bakom – med stöd av interna utbildningar, Microsoft-certifieringar och mentorskap.


Vi söker dig som:


Har en utbildning inom IT, ekonomi, logistik eller liknande – eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet


Har ett intresse för affärssystem, digitalisering och verksamhetsutveckling


Är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och trivs med att samarbeta


Har viss erfarenhet av affärssystem (t.ex. som användare, via praktik eller i en supportroll) – meriterande men inget krav


**Hantering av ansökningar**

På grund av sommarledigheter kommer handläggningen av inkomna ansökningar att ske med viss fördröjning. Vi kommer att börja behandla ansökningarna igen från och med vecka 34, måndagen den 18 augusti. Tack för ditt tålamod och förståelse!
company_description: Fujitsu is a leading Japanese information & communication technology company, offering a range of technology products, solutions & services.

title: Senior Systemintegratör
description:
- **Är du en erfaren systemintegratör som vill vara med och bygga framtidens integrationslösningar i molnet? Har du ett öga för effektiva flöden och brinner för att koppla samman system på ett smart och hållbart sätt? Då kan du vara den vi söker!**

Vi söker nu en engagerad systemintegratör till vårt kontor i Halmstad. Vi söker dig som vill specialisera dig på att skapa integrationslösningar med hjälp av Azure Integration Services men som även har erfarenhet av Microsoft BizTalk Server. Hos Devoteam får du en nyckelroll i vårt team av experter där vår målsättning är att hjälpa våra kunder att modernisera och optimera sina IT-landskap. Vi ger dig givetvis möjligheten att bli en certifierad integratör genom vårt samarbete med Entiros, vilket ger dig en stark kompetensprofil och erkännande i branschen.


***Arbetsplatsen för den här rollen är Halmstad med omnejd, på plats 3-5 dagar i veckan.***

  
**Vad innebär rollen?**  

**Som Systemintegratör hos oss kommer du att:**

* Designa och utveckla integrationslösningar baserade på Azure Integration Services.
* Följa och implementera principerna för Entiros Certified Integrator för att säkerställa hög kvalitet och standard i våra leveranser.
* Implementera och driftsätta robusta och skalbara integrationer mellan olika system och applikationer, både i molnet och on-premise.
* Arbeta nära våra kunder för att förstå deras behov och översätta dem till tekniska lösningar.
* Delta i spännande migrationsprojekt där du kommer att hjälpa kunder att modernisera sina integrationsplattformar, ofta med fokus på att migrera från äldre BizTalk-lösningar till Azure.
* Kontinuerligt utveckla din kompetens inom Azure Integration Services och relaterade teknologier.

  
**Vi söker dig som har:**

* 5 års relevant erfarenhet av systemintegration, gärna med fokus på molnbaserade lösningar.
* Erfarenhet av Microsoft BizTalk Server.
* Erfarenhet av programmering (t.ex. Go, .NET, Java).
* God förståelse för integrationsmönster och arkitektur.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Azure Integration Services.
* En problemlösande och analytisk förmåga.
* God samarbetsförmåga och trivs med att arbeta i team.
* Är flytande i tal och skrift i svenska och engelska på social och teknisk nivå.

**Det är ett stort plus om du även har:**

* Erfarenhet av migrationsprojekt från BizTalk till modernare plattformar.
* Kunskap om andra molnplattformars integrationstjänster.
* Certifieringar inom Azure.
* Erfarenhet av agila arbetsmetoder.

  
- **Om Devoteam**  

Hos oss värderar vi medarbetarnas trivsel och utveckling högt. Vi har byggt en arbetskultur där människor känner sig inspirerade, utmanade och trygga. Vi tror att när du trivs och växer, så gör även våra lösningar det. Vi är ett ledande IT-konsultföretag med en stark förankring i Halmstads tech-community, både som Devoteam och f.d .Jayway. Vi är engagerade i att skapa långsiktiga relationer med både kunder och medarbetare. Vi drivs av en passion för teknik och innovation, och erbjuder skräddarsydda lösningar för företag inom en rad olika branscher. Bland våra initiativ kan nämnas Øredev, en av Skandinaviens största utvecklarkonferenser, som vi var med och grundade.  



**Förmåner och praktisk information:**  

**Kontinuerligt lärande:** Vi stöder kontinuerligt lärande med kompetensgrupper varannan vecka, deltagande på Øredev och löpande kompetensdagar för din professionella utveckling. Du har möjlighet att ta certifikat med någon av våra partners (AWS, Azure, GCP, Entiros).


**Ledighet och pension:** Vi erbjuder 30 dagars semester, kompletterande föräldraledighetsersättning och tjänstepension enligt ITP1.


**Hälsa och välbefinnande:** Självklara förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag, tillgång till företagshälsovård, hälsokontroller och lunchyoga på kontoret **.**

**Verktyg och utrustning:** Du väljer själv de verktyg du behöver för att leverera och trivas i din arbetsmiljö.  



**Ansökan**  

För att ansöka, vänligen skicka din ansökan via länken nedan. Vi uppmuntrar tidiga ansökningar eftersom vi granskar dem löpande. För eventuella frågor, kontakta Sanna Ekelöf, vår rekryterare, på sanna.ekelof@devoteam.com. Sanna kommer att vara din primära kontaktperson under hela rekryteringsprocessen.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Senior Solution Architect
description:
- Devoteam, the #1 EMEA ServiceNow partner, empowers organisations to achieve breakthrough results with the Now Platform. With over 850 expert consultants across 18 countries, we drive business transformation by harnessing the power of ServiceNow's AI platform. Since 2009, we've delivered innovative digital workflows that optimise operational productivity, elevate employee experiences, and redefine customer engagement. Our holistic approach and deep expertise across the full ServiceNow platform ensure your success. As a ServiceNow Elite partner since 2019 and the proud recipient of the 2024 Partner of the Year award, Devoteam is your trusted guide to unlock the full potential of ServiceNow.

  
The Senior Solution Architect will be responsible for critical technical aspects of project and solution delivery, including:


* Provide expert consultation to clients on Service Strategy and Design, demonstrating the business value of Service Management solutions.
* Articulate and package our competencies within Service Strategy and Design services for both external clients and internal stakeholders.
* Contribute to the development of a premier Service Management practice and consultancy organization.
* Collaborate with sales to develop and execute a strategic go-to-market plan, leveraging our value-based competencies.
* Serve as an integral member of the implementation project team, addressing complex technical challenges across multiple projects simultaneously.
* Oversee the configuration and customization of SaaS solutions to meet client requirements.
* Produce high-quality, technically accurate client-facing and internal deliverables.
* Establish and maintain implementation best practices and service offerings based on project experiences and industry standards.
* Drive continuous improvement initiatives and provide strategic advice to enhance service delivery.
* Deliver comprehensive ITIL process knowledge and advisory services to clients.
* Assume the role of solution architect, taking full responsibility for the overall solution implementation.
* Provide expert business support advisory in alignment with Service Management best practices.
* Serve as the primary liaison between client demand organizations, analyzing and communicating the advantages and disadvantages of proposed solution architectures from both process and technical perspectives.
* Develop and articulate comprehensive solution architectures, addressing both process and technical aspects.
* Conduct thorough analyses of the business impact and value proposition of proposed solutions for clients.
* Lead and conduct both process-oriented and technical training sessions to ensure successful solution adoption.

  
* Proficiency in ITSM tools is highly desirable, though not mandatory.
* A minimum of 10 years of experience serving as a technical resource on delivery engagements in client environments is essential.
* Demonstrated expertise in Web Technologies, including but not limited to XML, HTML, JavaScript, and Web Services, is required.
* Comprehensive understanding of technical components such as LDAP, VPN, and SSL is crucial.
* Exceptional communication skills are paramount, including active listening, thoughtful decision-making, and superior verbal and written expression.
* A proven track record in consulting is necessary, encompassing a deep understanding of business drivers behind technology, problem-solving capabilities, meticulous attention to detail, resourcefulness, and the ability to ask pertinent questions.
* The ability to work effectively in a team environment is critical. Additionally, the willingness to travel, primarily within the Nordic region, is an important aspect of this role.
* ITIL Certification is a mandatory requirement for this position.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Senior Data Engineer at Electromobility
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match. We at Volvo Group are constantly moving and changing to be one step ahead in the technology journey and Electromobility is changing the automotive world, and we are now looking for you who want to be part of this change happening in our industry! By joining us, you’ll be part of a diverse team of highly skilled professionals who work with passion, trust each other, and embrace change to stay ahead. We make our customers win.

  

We also believe you are a curious person and want to go from idea to practice towards creating sustainable transport solutions. Strong stakeholder management and communication skills are key to success in this role.


We're looking for a skilled Data Engineer to join our dynamic team and drive change in Electromobility.

 **Role Summary:**

  

As a Senior Data Engineer, you will design, build, and maintain scalable data pipelines to enhance our analytical and business intelligence capabilities. You’ll work closely with data scientists, analysts, and stakeholders to ensure data quality, accessibility, and security, while troubleshooting and improving data systems. Cross-functional collaboration is key to gathering requirements and delivering data-driven solutions.

 **Key Responsibilities:**  

* Design and build robust, scalable data pipelines using PySpark to process large datasets.
* Utilize Python's Object-oriented programming principles to develop clean, reusable, and modular code for various data operations.
* Write complex SQL queries to perform data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) tasks.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver data-driven solutions.
* Maintain data security and compliance with company policies and regulatory standards.
* Troubleshoot and debug issues within data pipelines and related applications.
* Continuously improve existing systems by integrating new data management technologies and software engineering tools.
* Mentor colleagues who want to work with data engineering but have no/less experience.
 **Role requirements:**  

* Bachelor or Master of Science in Computer Science or related fields.
* Minimum 3 years of experience in working within data analytics or relevant areas, in particular as data engineer, preferably within Automative Industry.
* Proficient in PySpark, Python (with a strong understanding of object-oriented programming), and SQL.
* Experience working with Airflow, github, artifactory etc.
* Experience working with open source Bigdata tool stack
* Experience with data modeling, warehousing, and ETL processes.
* Strong analytical skills and ability to work with large, complex data sets.
* Excellent problem-solving abilities and detail orientation.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g. Azure), Data bricks and related services is a plus
 **Meritorious to have:**  

* Understanding of internal Volvo data flow
* Knowledge in Data lake
* Previous experience of working with time series
* Knowledge in DevOps/MLOps and technologies (eg. ML flow)

  

We are look for a proactive team player who thrives on collaboration and sharing ideas. You should have strong problem-solving abilities, an eagerness to innovate, and a keen eye for detail. Effective communication and a commitment to fostering an inclusive, supportive environment are essential.

  

We look forward to getting to receive your application!

  

As we are currently in the summer vacation period (Weeks 29–32), there may be limited/no progress on this position. We expect to resume the recruitment process in August. Thank you for your understanding.

 **Last Application Date:** 25th of july, 2025

 **Number of positions:** 2


Curious and want to know more about the role? Please feel free to reach out to me!  

Josefin Agnas, Group Manager - Data Analytics Team at Electromobility.  

E-mail adress: josefin.agnas@volvo.com

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group.** Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Trucks Technology** are seeking talents to help design sustainable transportation solutions for the future. As part of our team, you’ll help us by engineering exciting next-gen technologies and contribute to projects that determine new, sustainable solutions. Bring your love of developing systems, working collaboratively, and your advanced skills to a place where you can make an impact. Join our design shift that leaves society in good shape for the next generation.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: Product Architect
description:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
* Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
* Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.

 Requirements

title: IT Support Technician
description:
**Are you the person people turn to when their tech misbehaves? Do you enjoy solving problems, helping others, and exploring the mysteries of networking, hardware, and software? Whether you’re early in your IT journey or a seasoned support hero, this might be your next quest.**
 We’re looking for a curious, socially skilled, and tech-passionate
 **IT Support Technician** 
 to join our Stockholm HQ. At Paradox, support isn’t just about fixing things, it’s about enabling people to do their best work.
   

  

**Your Mission**
 You’ll be a key player in our internal IT team, providing hands-on and remote support across Windows, macOS, and Linux systems. You’ll help onboard new colleagues, manage hardware/software, keep our IT environment secure and stable and occasionally rescue a meeting by reviving the speaker system from the frozen plains.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Provide daily IT support to employees (hardware, software, services)
* Troubleshoot and resolve incidents both on-site and remotely
* Onboard/offboard users and manage accounts and devices
* Maintain conference rooms and other office IT systems
* Support projects to improve and scale our IT infrastructure


**About You**
 You’re a service-minded techie who communicates well, enjoys teamwork, and thrives in dynamic environments. You’re curious by nature and love learning new things as well as explaining them without sounding like a robot.
   

  

**Must-haves**
* A genuine interest in tech and helping others
* Strong communication skills in English
* Curiosity, accountability, and initiative


**Bonus If You Know**
* Windows Server, Active Directory
* Entra ID, Okta, Google Workspace
* Linux/macOS, networking basics, scripting (Python/Bash/Powershell)
* Ticketing systems (Freshservice, JIRA, etc.)


**About The Team**
 Paradox IT consists of two tightly connected teams -
 **IT Support** 
 and
 **IT Operations** 
 - currently eight people strong. While you’ll officially be part of the IT Support team, your work may span across both sides of IT and connect with many departments throughout the company.
   

  

**Practical Info**
* Location: Stockholm (on-site)
* Scope: Full-time, permanent
* Reports to: Head of IT
* Please note: We do not offer relocation assistance for this position.


**If you’re ready to level up your IT support skills in a place where curiosity is valued, teamwork is second nature, and every tech fix is part of the bigger game - apply now. Let’s shape the future of IT at Paradox together.**
 Today, Paradox consists of both publishing and internal game development. We have a broad portfolio of games and own the most important brands, including Stellaris, Europa Universalis, Hearts of Iron, Crusader Kings, Cities: Skylines, Prison Architect, Victoria, Age of Wonders and the World of Darkness catalog of brands.
   

  

 Since 2004, the company has published its games all over the world, initially through physical distribution but primarily in digital channels after 2006. Paradox games are developed primarily for PC and console platforms, but the company also releases games on mobile. The largest markets today include the US, UK, China, Germany, France and Scandinavia. In total, Paradox games have over five million players each month.

title: Brand & Business Analyst
description:
**Job Description**
 Do you want to help shape one of the world’s most recognized fashion brands for the future?
   

  

 We are looking for a Brand & Business Analyst to join our Global Marketing team. In this role, you will play a key part in strengthening H&M’s brand relevance and long-term growth by translating data into strategic insight. You will track brand health, monitor the competitive landscape, and identify emerging opportunities that guide how we position the brand in an evolving marketplace.
   

  

 This is a unique opportunity for someone who thrives at the intersection of brand, customer insight, and commercial strategy.
   

  

 Your key responsibilities include:
   

  

* Owning, driving & developing our global brand tracking program and with it monitor brand health across markets, keeping track of key brand equity metrics and long-term perception trends.
* Analyze market and competitor developments, identifying cultural shifts, category trends, and business implications.
* Identify high-potential audience segments, delivering insight into who our most relevant customers are — and how to grow with them.
* Deliver clear recommendations and strategic narratives that support brand planning, creative development, and business decisions.


**Qualifications**
**WHO YOU ARE**
 We are looking for people with...
   

  

* 3-5 years of experience working on brand related topics in large organizations or consulting firms.
* A bachelors or a Masters’ degree in Marketing, Business Analytics or a related field
* Advanced skills in Excel, with experience analysing large datasets
* Strong communication skills with the ability to distill complex insights into clear recommendations.
* Comfortable working in cross-functional teams and juggling multiple inputs from various stakeholders
* A genuine interest in fashion, trends and consumer culture as well as how brands grow through relevance and differentiation.
* Experience with brand tracking programs, brand research or insight tools is meriting.


 And people who are...
   

  

* Excellent communicators
* Curious, agile and proactive


**Additional Information**
 This is a full time Permanent Position based in Stockholm. Apply by sending in your CV and portfolio in English as soon as possible, but no later than
 **31st July 2025** 
 . Due to data policies, we only accept applications through our career page.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  

 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**
 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  

* 25% Staff discount on all our H&M Group brands, both in stores and online (H&M, COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories and ARKET).
* H&M Incentive Program – HIP. Learn more about the program here.
* In addition to our global benefits, our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. (Example: Competitive compensation for your dedication and long-term commitment. A day off on your birthday to relax and celebrate your special day. Special gift to celebrate the birth of your child, etc.)


**JOIN US**
 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  

  

  

 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.
   

  

 We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.

title: Data Analyst
description:
**📈 Data Analyst | Impact-Driven Company | Stockholm | Hybrid** 




  





**From Raw Data to Real-World Change. Help Drive Smarter Decisions Every Day.** 




  





 We’re hiring on behalf of a fast-moving company operating in a complex, data-rich industry. Whether it’s optimizing supply chains, improving customer operations, or supporting sustainability goals, data plays a central role in how this team drives performance and long-term impact.
 



  





 You’ll be joining a company where your insights influence real-world outcomes not just screen metrics.
 



  





 🔧 Your Role
 


* Analyze operational, financial, and customer data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and growth opportunities
* Work closely with operations, finance, and strategy teams to define KPIs and measure performance
* Build dashboards and visualizations that make complex data accessible to decision-makers
* Support data governance efforts and help maintain high-quality, trusted datasets
* Lead or contribute to deep-dive investigations and data-backed business cases



  





 🔍 You Bring
 


* 3+ years of experience in a data analyst or business intelligence role
* Proficiency in SQL and experience pulling data from relational databases
* Strong analytical thinking and the ability to communicate insights clearly
* Familiarity with at least one BI tool (e.g. Power BI, Qlik, Tableau)
* Bonus: Experience working with ERP systems, supply chain data, or Excel-based reporting workflows



  





 💼 Why Join?
 


* See your analysis drive decisions across critical areas of the business
* Work in a stable, purpose-driven company with real-world impact
* Hybrid flexibility and a culture of trust and autonomy
* Cross-functional collaboration and exposure to different business units
* Competitive salary, long-term stability, and development opportunities



  





 Curious about the numbers behind real operations? This role lets you dig in, explore, and influence. 🧠 Apply today with your CV!

title: IT-leveransansvarig inom Infrastruktur
description:
**V** 
**älkommen till en värderingsstyrd organisation**
**Attendo är Nordens största omsorgsföretag och vi leder utvecklingen av kvalitet, innovationer och nya, kostnadseffektiva arbetssätt i branschen. Vill du vara med och leda leveransen av modern och säker IT-infrastruktur i en verksamhetskritisk miljö? Har du djup kompetens inom Microsoft-teknologier och brinner för att skapa stabila, effektiva och framtidssäkra lösningar? Då kan du vara den vi söker!**
**Beskrivning av tjänsten**
 Som IT-leveransansvarig blir du en nyckelperson i vår IT-organisation med ansvar för att säkerställa att vår IT-infrastruktur levereras enligt verksamhetens krav och förväntningar. Du ansvarar för leveranskvalitet, kontinuitet och vidareutveckling inom området, i nära samarbete med driftspartner, interna intressenter och IT-arkitekter.
   

  

 Rollen omfattar både on-prem och molnbaserade lösningar, där Microsofts teknologier står i centrum. Du leder och koordinerar tekniska initiativ, följer upp leveranser och säkerställer att de håller hög kvalitet och är i linje med verksamhetens behov.
   

  

 Har du tidigare arbetat inom IT-infrastruktur, IT-drift eller liknande roller inom IT och är redo för nästa steg i karriären? Som IT-leveransansvarig säkerställer och utvecklar du en god affärsrelation samt partnerskap med våra olika leverantörer inom området. I rollen får du ansvaret för en bred flora av tjänster där du blir spindeln i nätet för organisationen då dina ansvarsområden är en förutsättning för att organisationens olika initiativ och projekt ska lyckas.
   

  

 Utvecklingsmöjligheterna inom Attendo är stora och det finns goda möjligheter att avancera vidare till andra roller inom bolaget. Vi söker dig som drivs av att hjälpa människor och underlätta vardagen för kollegor och i förlängningen våra kunder.
   

  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**
* Ansvara för leveransen inom IT-infrastruktur
* Säkerställa drift, tillgänglighet och livscykelhantering i en Microsoft-baserad miljö (Windows Server, AD, Azure, m.m.).
* Samordna externa och interna IT-leverantörer samt följa upp SLA och avtal.
* Medverka i och driva utvecklingsprojekt inom infrastruktur, identitetshantering och säkerhet.
* Bidra till förbättrad IT-säkerhet och efterlevnad av policys och regelverk.


**Kvalifikationer**
**Krav**
* Flerårig erfarenhet av IT-infrastruktur i Microsoft-miljö, både on-prem och i Azure.
* God kunskap inom Active Directory, nätverk, lagring och serverhantering.
* Erfarenhet av att leda tekniska leveranser eller projekt inom IT.
* Mycket god förmåga att kommunicera och samverka med både teknik- och verksamhetssidan.
* God svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande**
* Kunskap inom IT-säkerhet, t.ex. hantering av säkerhetsincidenter, policies, eller standarder som ISO 27001.
* Kunskap om säkerhetsarkitektur, segmentering, zero trust, samt skydd av kritisk infrastruktur.
* Erfarenhet av MIM (Microsoft Identity Manager) eller andra identitetshanteringssystem.
* Erfarenhet av hybridmiljöer och migrering mellan on-prem och moln.
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla eller implementera hostingstrategier, inklusive hybridlösningar, molntransitioner och val av driftmodeller.
* Tidigare arbete med säkerhetsklassificering av information och miljöer.


**Vem är du?**
 Du är en social person med ett starkt intresse för IT som vill utvecklas inom området. Du har helst några års IT-erfarenhet och gillar problemlösning och kontakt med människor, relevant utbildning är meriterande. Du arbetar självständigt men trivs med att arbeta i team och har god samarbetsförmåga och är pedagogisk. Att ta egna initiativ och vilja göra förbättringar kommer naturligt för dig. Du är flexibel i ditt arbetssätt och räds inte att ta själv ta ansvar för åtgärder och felavhjälpning vid behov. Du har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.
   

  

**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?**
 Attendo är en trygg arbetsgivare som kan erbjuda dig som vill goda möjligheter att ta mer ansvar eller att gå vidare till nya roller. Vi erbjuder dig som medarbetare utbildningsmöjligheter, kollektivavtal, friskvård samt flera andra förmåner och personalrabatter via vår förmånsportal Attendo+.
   

  

**Om rekryteringsprocessen**
 Före eventuell anställning ska utdrag ur belastningsregistret tillsammans med giltig fotolegitimation visas upp. Om du blir kallad till en intervju behöver du kunna styrka att du har rätt att arbeta i Sverige, genom att uppvisa att du har medborgarskap inom EU/EES eller ett giltigt arbetstillstånd.
   

  

 Tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag så vänta inte med din ansökan!
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan – Tillsammans för framtidens omsorg!**

title: IT Service Manager
description:
**Do you have a knack for bringing order to chaos, a natural sense for coordination, and a curious mind that always wants to know how things can be done better? If you’re part strategist, part problem-solver, and all about good teamwork - your next quest might start here.**
 At Paradox Interactive, our worlds are filled with rich stories, strategic depth, and passionate communities. Behind the scenes, our IT department ensures the gears keep turning. We’re now looking for an
 **IT Service Manager** 
 to join the party - someone who can help us grow and improve how we deliver internal IT services across the company.
   

  

**Your Mission**
 As
 **IT Service Manager** 
 , you’ll play a pivotal role in our IT Operations team, while also bridging collaboration with IT Support and other departments. You’ll be responsible for the service catalog, guiding the evolution of IT service delivery, and bringing structure to both recurring tasks and project-based adventures.
   

  

 Whether it’s improving how we handle requests, supporting tool rollouts, or helping teams understand what’s available to them - you’ll make sure IT is a dependable and well-understood companion on everyone’s journey.
   

  

**You’ll Be Doing Things Like**
* Maintaining and improving the IT service catalog and service-related processes
* Leading project work through coordination, documentation, and follow-up
* Analyzing service metrics and identifying ways to improve delivery
* Acting as a liaison between IT Support and IT Operations to handle cross-functional needs
* Collaborating with other departments to align IT services with company needs
* Proposing new tools or processes where you see potential for better efficiency or clarity


**About You**
 You see the value in both planning and improvising. You enjoy connecting dots, aligning teams, and clarifying the “how” and “why” behind what we do. Most of all, you’re curious - you ask questions, explore possibilities, and love helping others find better ways of working.
   

  

**Your Skillset Includes**
* A solid background in IT support or IT service delivery
* Familiarity with frameworks like ITIL (or similar)
* Experience with ticketing systems (e.g. Freshservice, Jira, or ServiceNow)
* Documentation skills and a methodical approach to process improvement
* Project management or project coordination experience
* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal. English is our primary work language.
* Curious, inquisitive and customer focused mindset
* Strong sense of accountability and ownership


 You’re comfortable switching between structured plans and ad-hoc problem-solving. You care about getting things done - but also
 *how* 
 they’re done, and how to make them better next time.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Paradox IT consists of two tightly connected teams -
 **IT Support** 
 and
 **IT Operations** 
 - currently eight people strong. While you’ll officially be part of the IT Operations team, your work will span across both sides of IT and connect with many departments throughout the company. Think of it as a hub role in a highly collaborative network.
   

  

**If you’re ready to level up your service delivery skills in a place where curiosity is encouraged, collaboration is key, and the tech is part of the adventure - apply now. Let’s write the next chapter of IT at Paradox together.**
 Today, Paradox consists of both publishing and internal game development. We have a broad portfolio of games and own the most important brands, including Stellaris, Europa Universalis, Hearts of Iron, Crusader Kings, Cities: Skylines, Prison Architect, Victoria, Age of Wonders and the World of Darkness catalog of brands.
   

  

 Since 2004, the company has published its games all over the world, initially through physical distribution but primarily in digital channels after 2006. Paradox games are developed primarily for PC and console platforms, but the company also releases games on mobile. The largest markets today include the US, UK, China, Germany, France and Scandinavia. In total, Paradox games have over five million players each month.

title: DW-testare
description:
Uppdrag: Testautomation inom Data Warehouse (DW)
   

  

 Vi söker en erfaren och tekniskt skicklig testautomationsspecialist med gedigen bakgrund inom data warehouse och molnbaserade plattformar. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i arbetet med att säkra kvaliteten i ett avancerat informationsförsörjningssystem som bygger på moderna teknologier såsom Azure och Snowflake. Uppdraget innefattar allt från analys och design till utveckling av helautomatiserade testramverk.
   

  

 Ansvarsområden:
   

  

* Utvärdera, förbättra och implementera nya strategier och angreppssätt för automatiserade tester som en integrerad del av den kontinuerliga utvecklingsprocessen (SDLC).
* Arbeta med verktyg som Robot Framework och X-Automate (XAM) för att utveckla och förbättra automatiserade testlösningar.
* Föreslå och genomföra kvalitetsförbättringar i befintliga testaktiviteter i linje med agila ramverk såsom SAFe.
* Stötta utvecklingsteamen med testkompetens och bidra till kunskapsöverföring inom organisationen.
* Samarbeta nära med andra funktioner inom verksamheten för att säkerställa testbarhet, spårbarhet och kvalitet i dataleveranser.


 Kvalifikationer:
   

  

 Obligatoriska:
   

  

* Minst 6 års erfarenhet av testautomatisering i data warehouse-miljöer.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av SQL och testning av datakällor.
* Kunskap om testning i analysplattformar och förståelse för molnteknologi.
* Förtrogenhet med Azure DevOps och ISTQB Foundation-certifiering.
* Minst 1 års erfarenhet av datakällesintegration (data sourcing) till DWH.
* Tidigare arbete med molnbaserade lösningar såsom Snowflake.
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


 Meriterande:
   

  

* ISTQB Advanced Level Test Analyst-certifiering eller motsvarande.
* Erfarenhet av SAFe eller liknande agila ramverk.
* Kunskap om Azure Data Lake och Azure Data Factory.
* Erfarenhet av filbaserad testning (import/export).
* Domänkunskap inom försäkringssystem.
* Grundläggande programmeringskunskap i Python.


 Personliga egenskaper:
   

  

 Vi söker dig som är lösningsorienterad, strukturerad och kommunikativ. Du trivs i en agil och tekniskt komplex miljö, tar ansvar för ditt arbete och har lätt för att samarbeta. Förmågan att tänka analytiskt och agera pragmatiskt är avgörande för att lyckas i uppdraget.
   

  

**Om Rasulson Consulting**
 Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med ledande tech-bolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda spännande karriärmöjligheter för dig med intresse för digital utveckling. Genom vår djupa tekniska förståelse och vårt starka nätverk kan vi snabbt matcha rätt kompetenser med rätt uppdrag. Hos oss får du personlig vägledning, regelbunden återkoppling och möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär.

title: Junior nätverkstekniker
description:
Till ett uppdrag hos en av våra kunder i Stockholm söker vi nu en junior nätverkstekniker som är i början av sin IT-karriär.
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att bygga på sin karriär.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 Du kommer att ingå i ett team på ca 40 personer som arbetar med nätverkssupport. Tillsammans kommer ni att ansvara för incidenthantering, funktionssupport och användarstöd till företagets kunder. Ni kommer att genomföra felsökningar av förbindelser och ha löpande dialog med kunder, leverantörer och partners.
   

  

 Efter en tid i rollen kommer du få omkring 2-5 kunder som du ansvarar lite extra för där du kommer att delta i månatliga möten tillsammans med kund.
   

  

 I denna roll kommer du att erbjudas goda utvecklingsmöjligheter. Du kommer att skapa dig en bred kompetens där du lär dig en mängd system och en personlig utvecklingsplan som ständigt hjälper dig att vässa dina kunskaper.
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta i ett kontor som ligger centralt vid Hötorget i Stockholm med en social atmosfär.
   

  

**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 Vi söker dig som har en eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT / data / nätverk alternativt motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet. Som person är du självgående, social och serviceinriktad. Du är en problemlösare och kan ta egna initativ.
   

  

*Krav*
* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT / data / nätverk alternativt motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
* Kunskaper inom TCP/IP och de vanligaste protokollens funktion som exempelvis BGP, OSPF, ISIS
* Erfarenhet av Cisco
* Flytande i svenska & engelska i tal och skrift


*Meriterande*
* Har arbetat i en kundnära roll
* Är bekant med MPLS och anslutningstekniker för fiber


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

*Mer om oss*
 Centric är ett IT-företag med 370 anställda och med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Business Development Manager
description:
Workster is parterning with a leading technology provider in the payment and commerce space, seeking a Business Development Manager to expand its presence in the Retail, Hospitality, and Food & Beverage sectors across the Swedish market.
   

  

 The company offers a suite of innovative solutions, including payment processing, tax-free shopping services, dynamic currency conversion, and merchant support platforms. It is rapidly growing internationally, backed by significant private investment and driven by a mission to simplify and connect global commerce.
   

  

 This is a 100% new business B2B sales role, focused on identifying and securing partnerships with merchants who have a strong international customer base. Your mission will be to promote and sell a portfolio of core solutions (Payment Gateway, Acquiring, DCC, Tax-Free Services), working closely with internal stakeholders across multiple departments.
   

  

 Your Role
   

  

* Segment and prioritize opportunities in the Retail, Hospitality, and F&B industries
* Develop commercial business cases to support strategic investments
* Create and implement a detailed Sales Development Plan
* Build and manage a high-quality pipeline of new business opportunities
* Exceed monthly, quarterly, and annual new business sales targets
* Oversee the full sales cycle and transition clients to Account Management post-sale
* Respond to partner and client queries in a timely and professional manner
* Lead on proposals, tenders, and presentation delivery
* Ensure all CRM records are accurately maintained with relevant client and opportunity data
* Provide clear reporting and sales forecasting to management
* Contribute ideas and collaboration to the wider sales team
* Represent the company professionally and constructively at all times


**Your Qualifications**
* Proven experience in B2B new business sales, ideally in retail, hospitality, F&B, or payment services
* Experience selling to stakeholders in Operations, IT, or Finance
* Strong understanding of the Swedish market in retail and hospitality
* Knowledge of solutions such as Card Acquiring, DCC, Tax-Free, EPOS, or e-commerce platforms is highly desirable
* Familiar with card scheme pricing and negotiation of merchant acquiring agreements
* Proficient in CRM platforms (Salesforce or similar) and confident using tools like PowerPoint, Excel, Word, Outlook
* Effective communicator, with strong networking and presentation skills
* Experience working in an international matrix organization is a plus
* Native-level Swedish and fluent English


 The Offer
   

  

* A confident and target-driven sales professional, with a passion for closing deals
* Highly organized with strong time management and project coordination skills
* Able to work both independently and collaboratively within a fast-paced team
* Comfortable adapting to change and navigating complex sales cycles
* Focused on delivering exceptional client experiences and long-term partnerships
* Positive, proactive, and flexible in a high-growth, evolving environment


 Skills: excel,powerpoint,project coordination,time management,outlook,epos,retail,tax-free services,card acquiring,presentation skills,partnership management,word,e-commerce platforms,management,b2b sales,salesforce,swedish,networking,dcc,business development

title: Information Technology Security Engineer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Information Services, and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**Hello,** 




  





**I hope you are doing good.** 




  





**Position – IT Security Engineer / Product Architect** 




**Location – Stockholm, Sweden (Onsite)** 




**Experience - 8+ Years** 




**Language - English** 




**Duration - 6 months Contract, It's extendable.** 




  





**Job Description**




 Bachelor’s degree in business information systems or equivalent. • Minimum 10-15 years of IT security and related experience, preferably in a multi-national firm.• Experience managing multiple projects and tasks. Must be self-motivated, goal-oriented, strong self-accountability, and results-driven in alignment with organizational goals. • Experience with working with various information manufacturing/operational technologies (OT) technologies (e.g., AWS & Azure cloud technologies, networking technologies, OT security tools, business applications and architectural methodologies) • Experience with information and manufacturing/operational technologies (OT) security processes, data classification processes, and industry standard implementation methodologies.• Experience designing, implementing, and sustaining information security controls and associated processes. It would be a plus if you also possess previous experience in:• Solid sense of personal accountability regarding decision-making and managing strong business relationships in a cross-matrix environment to achieve objectives. • Good communication skills and ability to efficiently elaborate issues and risks to all partners and senior management.• Experience working in a highly collaborative environment and promoting a collaboration-mentality to develop, deliver, operationalize, document, and support solutions.• Excellent facilitation skills and ability to use influence to negotiate positive outcomes.

title: Delivery Lead (Technology)
description:
Headquartered in Baltimore, USA, Allegis Group was established in 1983 and it is the fourth largest staffing company in the world. The Group includes more than 12,000 employees in over 400 offices, and it consists of a number of specialist operating companies that serve a wide variety of industries and clients across the world.
 



 The Allegis Group EMEA Region is focused on three brands Aerotek, Aston Carter and TEKsystems which enable us to offer a broad selection of staffing and services solutions across different industries. Currently made up of 14 offices, the EMEA Region is the fastest growing region within the Group. The Region also includes the TEKsystems Global Services brand which is the sister company of TEKsystems and responsible for the supply of full IT services.
 



 Our experience and expertise mean we are able to build solid relationships with clients who value our involvement in helping them solve their business challenges. Across all our brands we foster a strong ethos of driving quality, embedding a positive and dynamic vision for our future, achieving outstanding levels of service as well as creating career opportunities for our people that contribute to our overall success.
 



 To Learn more about a career within Delivery at TGS please click here :
 



 https://allegiscloud.sharepoint.com/sites/theone/development/sales/TEKsystemsDevelopmentHub/Pages/TGS-Delivery-Hub.aspx
 



  





 The Delivery Lead role is a critical role within the TEKsystems Global Services (TGS) delivery organization and is responsible for managing one or more projects/engagements at a time A
 



 successful Delivery Lead possesses skillsets for managing people, processes, and issue resolution.
 



 The Delivery function varies in responsibility from account to account, but a successful Delivery Lead is responsible for common activities such as on/off boarding of consultants, reporting and metrics to support Consultant activities and issue resolution. The Delivery Lead provides ownership of Customer expectations, and delivery assurance of associated services, deliverables, and all-round outcomes for Customers. The Delivery Lead is responsible for quantifying the business benefits from the project outcome throughout the engagement.
 



 The responsibilities listed below are not exhaustive, as each account will state their unique
 



 requirements in the Statement of Work (SoW) or as defined with the Account Team at the start of the project. Below are the responsibilities of a Delivery Lead.
 



  





**Key Accountabilities:** 




 Solution Delivery:
 


* Ensure understanding of project vision/SoW deliverables, and any technical requirements as defined by Customer
* Understand SoWs/MSAs and importance of meeting deliverables/expectations of the Customer
* Collaborate with the Account Team to manage risk, project scope, and deliver according to the terms and conditions of our contracts
* Manage revenue tracker for assigned engagement(s)
* Consolidate project status and budget information across projects and/or portfolio of projects
* Consolidate and provide project reporting regarding resources, financials or as requested by the Customer via a Monthly and/or Quarterly Business Reviews (MBR/QBR)
* Identify and coordinate project change control processes
* Perform issue management and facilitate issue resolution with proper notification to all affected parties
* Understand escalation protocol between Consultants, Customers and Account Managers
* Understand timekeeping processes and ensure Consultants are entering their time correctly and on time
* Establish and perform periodic Customer, project, and solution “health checks” baselined against the target metrics associated with the Value Streams defined at the onset of the engagement
* Accountable for project and Customer requirements to maintain Customer relationship and ensure high level of Customer satisfaction
* Ensure customer reference ability and, support and enhance on-going relationships
* Participate in Account Strategy with internal stakeholders relative to project status, opportunities, and imminent risks
* Building and supporting established reporting cadences, status reports and budgetary documentation
* Drive growth by searching for new and improved ways of serving our Customers, collaborating with Solutions and Sales Teams
* Maintain a clear view of the Customer’s current and future business needs above and beyond the engagement deliverables
* Support the identification of opportunities and leads to support Sales pipeline



  





 Management Responsibilities:
 


* Act as a servant leader in leading/directing delivery activities
* Develop and maintain project related documentation including processes, tools, and procedures
* Understand and manage Customer requirements (deliverables) to ensure contract compliance and Customer satisfaction
* Maintain project artifacts
* Keep internal status and risk reports up-to-date
* Ensure Human Resources policies and procedures are communicated to Consultant staff
* Support of other projects and/or Delivery team members as required



  





 Resource Management:
 


* Communicate and/or track Consultant requirement details as requested
* Responsible for on-boarding/off-boarding of project Consultants
* Collaborating with Talent Delivery and Account Managers in preparation for STP day
* Issue resolution as needed
* Performance tracking and reporting as requested



  





**Requisite Abilities and/or Skills** 



* Excellent oral and written communication skills (English and Swedish is a must; Spanish or German a plus)
* Analysis and problem-solving skills
* Time management and organizational skills
* Personnel management skills
* Demonstrable project data/ risk analysis and correlation/ mitigation skills
* Excellent Customer service skills
* Can prioritize and manage own work, with management support



  





**Basic Qualifications and Experience** 



* Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent, relevant experience
* 2+ years in IT service management/project management providing project and delivery management and daily operational oversight within a technology professional services environment or equivalent.
* Experience in traditional and agile project management methodologies preferred
* IT Experience: Delivery Team Member, Customer Success Manager, Project Manager, Business Analyst, QA, Developer, Scrum Master, or other



  





**IT experience** 



* Understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle
* Understanding of Services Outsourcing
* Agile, Project Management and ITIL certifications a plus
* People management skills
* Intermediate to advanced proven experience with both Excel and PowerPoint
* Financial management and reporting experience
* Stakeholder management



  





**Additional Requirements** 



* Complex internal and external stakeholder management experience preferably with a consulting services technology provider
* Experience working under different project frameworks within various IT environments
* Advanced understanding of IT environments and able to demonstrate initiative in challenging project situations to provide continual improvement throughout the delivery of services
* Participate as a named mentor to coach and/or develop other peer Delivery team members
* Customer First Mindset
* This role may include both domestic and international travel from time to time
* Other duties as requested



  





**Core Competencies** 




 Collaborates:
 


* Works in partnership with internal stakeholders and Delivery team to discuss project strategy, scope, and overall health of any current projects
* Partners with Delivery Managers, Account Managers, Account Directors, Solution Executives and Business Development Managers to manage risk and ensure we are delivering to the terms and conditions of our contract
* Participates in monthly financial review meetings with Back Office (FSG, OSG, Fin Ops, DSO)



 Communicates Effectively:
 


* Thoroughly documents all escalation procedures then communicates to necessary audiences, Customer, Consultant, Managers
* Actively listens to others
* Clearly articulates the Customer/SoW requirements and relevant supporting FMLC processes
* Proactively contributes to Customer/account discussions and attends war boards and account meetings



 Instils Trust
 


* Maintains positive rapport with Consultants and Customers by following through on commitments fulfilling the 1:24 rule (acknowledge within 1 hour, respond within 24)
* Develops and maintains trust with Delivery Managers and other internal partners by acting on feedback and ensuring project success.
* Initiate internal relationships by understanding one another’s roles, how to lean on each other for success and act as a supportive peer to Delivery Lead



 Action Orientated
 


* Identifies concerns, such as sourcing gaps, and quickly communicates to Delivery Manager and Delivery team
* Facilitates issue resolution using root cause analysis and identifies proper parties to communicate to
* Proactively anticipates Customer needs, creates solutions and contingency plans to limit issues
* Advocates for TEKsystems Global Services (TGS) when possible, to support growth opportunities with customers
* Contributes, collaborates, and drives internal functional initiatives

title: IT-support
description:
Är du en driven IT-supportperson med erfarenhet av systemadministration och en vilja att utvecklas? Då har vi den perfekta rollen för dig!
   

  

**Om BioArctic**
 BioArctic är ett innovativt biofarmaceutiskt företag med fokus på att utveckla behandlingar för neurologiska sjukdomar som Alzheimers och Parkinsons. Vi erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där du får möjlighet att bidra till banbrytande forskning och förstklassiga tekniska lösningar. Att arbeta hos oss innebär att vara del av ett team som gör skillnad för människor världen över.
   

  

**Din Vardag**
 Vi söker en IT-support & systemadministratör som kommer att spela en avgörande roll i att säkerställa en fungerande IT-miljö för våra anställda. Du kommer att hantera och prioritera IT-supportärenden, felsöka och lösa problem, samt delta i IT-förbättringsprojekt. Din roll innebär även att ge tekniskt stöd och utbildning till användare, samt att samarbeta med externa leverantörer vid behov.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi tror att en person med erfarenhet som konsult skulle passa detta jobb ypperligt, då du är van vid att arbeta i olika miljöer och snabbt anpassa dig till nya system och processer. Du har förmågan att prata IT med folk så att de förstår, vilket gör dig serviceinriktad och pedagogisk. Du har minst två års erfarenhet av IT-support eller helpdesk och är van vid att arbeta med ärendehanteringssystem. Du har gedigna kunskaper i Windows-miljöer och Microsoft 365, samt grundläggande nätverkskunskaper. Du är strukturerad och självgående, samt problemlösande och analytisk. Utöver detta har du en grundläggande förståelse för IT-säkerhet och är flytande i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
   

  

**Önskvärda Kvalifikationer**
* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT, såsom YH eller högskola
* Kunskap om Active Directory och användarhantering
* Erfarenhet av MDM-lösningar för bärbara enheter
* Tidigare erfarenhet av systemadministration eller IT-förvaltning
* Förmåga att hantera stress och arbeta under tidspress


**Plats Och Arbetstid**
 Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm och arbetstiden är förlagd under ordinarie kontorstid, 08:00–17:00.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Vi söker att tillsätta tjänsten omgående och intervjuar löpande under sommaren, därför ser vi fram emot din ansökan via vår hemsida så snart som möjligt. På hemsidan kan du även läsa om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR.
   

  

 Ta nästa steg i din karriär och bli en del av vårt team!

title: (Associate) IT Project Manager (IT Base and Platforms) – based in Luxembourg
description:
**This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence.** 
 The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support.
   

  

 The
 **EIB** 
 , the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Group Corporate Services Directorate (GCS), Group Digital Office (GDO), Data and Information Solutions Department (DIS), at its headquarters in Luxembourg, an
 **(Associate) IT Project Manager (IT Base and Platforms)\*** 
**.**
**This is a full time position at grade 4/5 for which the EIB offers a permanent contract.**
*\*internal benchmark* 
*(Associate) Officer IT Applications*
*Panel interviews are foreseen as from July 2025*
 Purpose
   

  

 You will design, plan, coordinate, implement and report on IT Base and Platforms (IBP) Value Chain projects in line with business needs and the EIB Digital transformation Programme, with a view of promoting a digital workplace at the EIB and to achieve the agreed project/program results.
   

  

 Operating Network
   

  

 The IT Base and Platforms PMO reports directly to the Head of Department.
   

  

 This position works in liaison with the other team members in the department, particularly those involved in the IBP stream governance. In the incumbent also has extensive contacts with members of the Platforms & Services Department, representatives from Business Solutions Department and other divisions in GDO.
   

  

 Accountabilities
   

  

* Take project management responsibilities for assigned IT projects (mainly, from the IT Base and Platforms (IBP) Value Stream), coordination, scheduling and implementation of new or enhanced software applications with business users and other IT technical teams to ensure the completion of project within set time, budget and quality objectives.
* Support the IBP Steering Committee in the implementation of the governance defined for the stream.
